L

Launcher - Class in model
The java file which is run to start the game
Launcher() - Constructor for class model.Launcher
 
layer - Variable in class component.Component
The layer on which this component is displayed
layerIndex - Variable in class component.Component
The index of this Component in a helper List inside of the LayerManager class (For use in removal from the list)
layerManager - Variable in class state.State
The LayerManager
LayerManager - Class in view
A class for handling layers (drawing Components on top of other Components) maintains a LinkedList of Components in order of their layer
LayerManager() - Constructor for class view.LayerManager
Constructs a new LayerManager
LayerManager.Node - Class in view
A Node in the LinkedList
LEFT - Static variable in class component.Tile
The index in the neighbors array of the Tile to the left of this one
LENGTH - Static variable in class component.Tile
The height and width of a Tile
lightAnimation - Static variable in class assets.Assets
The light on top of the tower in the main menu
LightAnimation() - Constructor for class assets.Assets.LightAnimation
Constructs a new LightAnimation
lightAnimation - Variable in class state.MenuState
A little animation for the light on top of the tower
link(int, int) - Method in class model.TileManager.TileGrid
Links the given Tile so that it knows about the adjacent Tiles in the grid
linkHelper(Tile, int, int, int) - Method in class model.TileManager.TileGrid
A helper method for TileManager.TileGrid.link(int, int) The former links a tile to the tiles around it, this links the other way around Very useful if the Tile is null
lit - Variable in class assets.Assets.SettingsButton
 
lit - Variable in class assets.Assets.StartGameButton
 
load() - Method in class state.GameState
 
load() - Method in class state.MenuState
 
load() - Method in class state.SettingsState
 
load() - Method in class state.State
Loads all assets associated with the State into memory
Loader - Class in model
A class for Loading media files from the computer to the game
Loader() - Constructor for class model.Loader
 
loadGameAssets() - Static method in class assets.Assets
 
loadingBackground - Static variable in class assets.Assets
The background of the loading screen
LoadingBackground() - Constructor for class assets.Assets.LoadingBackground
 
loadingBackground - Variable in class model.Game
These Components are kept loaded in the Game for display when the game is changing States
loadingText - Static variable in class assets.Assets
The "Loading.." text on the loading screen
LoadingText() - Constructor for class assets.Assets.LoadingText
 
loadingText - Variable in class model.Game
 
loadLoadingScreenAssets() - Static method in class assets.Assets
Loads the assets for the loading screen.
loadMenuAssets() - Static method in class assets.Assets
Loads the assets for the main menu state
loadTexture(String) - Static method in class model.Loader
Loads an image from the given path name
lock() - Method in class component.Tile
This tile can no longer be interacted with by the mouse
locked - Variable in class component.Tile
Whether or not the Tile is in the range of the tower and is editable
lockedSheet - Static variable in class component.Tile
The SpriteSheet of textures for tiles that are not editable
lockedTexture - Variable in class component.Tile
The texture for this Tile when it is locked
LogTile() - Constructor for class component.Tile.LogTile
See Tile.Tile(BufferedImage, BufferedImage, boolean, double, boolean, int, int)
